title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.18 - Explosives and inflammables
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.18 - Explosives and inflammables

State Regulations
(a) Explosive and hazardous or highly inflammable commodities or materials may only
be handled over, or received on the wharfs or terminals of the commission by
special arrangement with, and at the option of the commission and subject to

Federal, State and City rules and regulations. (b) If, and when, permitted, liquid petroleum
products, hay, straw, flax tow, and other commodities deemed extra hazardous
will be received only between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m., and must be
immediately removed from the premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
800.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
